description:
Flapping laces and Velcro straps can cost you power. Using the streamlined Boa® fit system, the RC3 keeps drag to a minimum and gives you precise micro adjustments to dial in the perfect fit. Equipped with a glass reinforced nylon midsole this shoe gives you great power transfer.

  • Boa® L6 dial fit system keeps the shoe aero’
  • Synthetic leather upper is easy to clean and breathes well
  • Glass fibre reinforced nylon sole provides stiff pedalling platform
  • Offset Boa connectors reduce pressure on the top of the foot
  • Durable, wide heel pads
name: Shimano SH-RC3 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
